unique.name: The Primordial Convergence
unique.note: Only spawns for SS designation players (level 100)

description.appearance: A swirling vortex of six different colored energies that constantly shift and merge, creating a roughly humanoid form that pulses with raw mystical power
description.behavior: Highly aggressive and unpredictable, drawn to areas of mystical convergence where it can feed on chaotic energies
description.ecology: Spawns spontaneously during convergence storms or at sites where multiple divine influences clash

special_vulnerabilities.effect: Takes 50% more damage when attacked by coordinated divine influences

abilities.name: Elemental Convergence Blast
abilities.description: Fires a projectile containing all six divine influences that explodes on impact

abilities.name: Mystical Instability Aura
abilities.description: Nearby players suffer mystical energy interference, reducing divine ability effectiveness
abilities.effect: Reduces divine ability damage by 25% within 30 feet

abilities.name: Convergence Spawn
abilities.description: Creates lesser elemental constructs from its own energy

abilities.name: Reality Fracture
abilities.description: Tears open temporary rifts to alternate timelines, creating unpredictable effects
effects: Players may experience brief alternate reality visions

rare_drops.description: Crystallized mystical energy from the elemental's core
The elemental's power source, used for high-end crafting

unique_drops.description: An extremely rare material that contains echoes of alternate timelines

tactics: Maintains distance and uses ranged attacks
Focuses on players with high divine ability usage
Uses terrain mystical energy to enhance abilities
Becomes more dangerous as health decreases

lore.origin: Convergence Elementals are not born but spontaneously manifest when mystical energies become too chaotic and unstable. They are living embodiments of what happens when the six divine influences lose their careful balance and begin to clash violently.
lore.purpose: These creatures serve no conscious purpose but act as nature's way of consuming and dissipating dangerous mystical imbalances. They are both symptom and attempted cure of mystical instability.
lore.cultural_significance: Scholars consider them harbingers of greater mystical disturbances. Their appearance often prompts investigations into the cosmic balance.

quest_integration.storyline_significance: Often serves as evidence of larger mystical disturbances in main story quests

metadata.author: PrimalMyst Development Team
metadata.balance_notes: Designed as high-level threat that requires understanding of mystical mechanics to defeat effectively
